results.title: Compound Danshen Dripping Pill inhibits hypercholesterolemia/atherosclerosis-induced heart failure in ApoE and LDLR dual deficient mice via multiple mechanisms
results.text_hl: Taken together, our study suggests that CDDP or CDDP plus a low dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can be an effective therapy to reduce @<m>DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@/@DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@-induced @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@.

results.title: Management of Hypercholesterolemia Through Dietary ss-glucans-Insights From a Zebrafish Model
